Today, we have adopted the National Communication Program, which aims at building awareness of knowledge, national culture and positive attitudes in society through integrated efforts
We have also adopted mechanisms and programs to implement the UAE's Green Development Strategy, which aims to achieve a clean environment and sustainable development that values ​​natural resources
We also adopted the formation of the Board of Trustees of the UAE Diplomatic Academy under the leadership of Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed, a creative diplomatic team to support a leading foreign policy
Today we also discussed the structure of the Emirates Space Agency, our practical steps are accelerating day after day to cut 60 million kilometers to reach the Red Planet

We also adopted mechanisms and programs to implement UAE's Green Development strategy, to achieve clean environment, sustainable development
Today we approved formation of Board of Trustees for Emirates Diplomatic Academy, a creative team supporting a pioneering foreign policy
We also discussed organizational structure of the UAE Space Agency. Working faster every day to start our 60 million Kms journey to Mars.

We launched today the World Humanitarian City Plan until 2021 .. We want the UAE to be the world's first humanitarian logistics center http://t.co/iDlWYBmq37
Today, 60% of the World Food Program's assistance comes from the UAE. The humanitarian city can respond to the relief of one million people at the same time

Today, we established a global humanitarian advisory council, which includes a group of pioneers of global humanitarian action, through which we want to put a new footprint in the international humanitarian process
The UAE will also host the World Humanitarian Forum every two years. During the forum, we will gather the best minds to share experiences and develop relief practices worldwide

(2/3) Strong public services - and a strong NHS - need a strong economy. That's why dealing with the deficit is absolutely vital.
(3/3) In May, Britain faces a choice: a clear plan to deal with the deficit and secure a better future - or chaos with the other parties.
